location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 29 to William Hornby, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from John Beaumont at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: A slim portion of text is missing on the right-hand side of Page 21.

mods.abstract: Letter discusses several financial and administrative issues. It also reports that Bussora [Basra] has reverted to Ottoman control and comments on the continuing state of fear in Persia following the death of Carem Cahn [Karim Khan], notably a possible rivalry between Sadoo Cahn [Sadiq Khan] and Zackey Cahn [Zaki Khan]. Shipped by the SuccessKetch.
